golden_diagnosis: 多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, parkinsonian type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to,Multiple system atrophy, cerebellar type,多系统萎缩/Multiple system atrophy; MSA/Multiple system atrophy/Multiple system atrophy 1, susceptibility to
predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple System Atrophy (MSA), particularly the cerebellar or parkinsonian variant
2. Spinocerebellar ataxia with associated urinary and neurological symptoms
3. Autonomic neuropathy with secondary neurological complications
4. Neurogenic bladder with associated spinal cord pathology
5. Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP)
6. Central nervous system vasculitis leading to multifocal ischemic injuries
7. Primary progressive aphasia with concomitant neurological findings
8. Spinal cord compression due to Schwannoma or other intramedullary lesion
9. Paraneoplastic syndrome secondary to lung neoplasm with neurological manifestations
10. Mitochondrial disease presenting with multi-system involvement, including the nervous system and urogenital system.
